name: My Little Sister
description:
STORY:

I was home alone with my little sister and I thought that let her play a computer game is a good idea... 
But, actually she needs a lot of help. Fortunately, I know some codes!

CONTROLS:

To play the game you have to type some "basic" commands.

You can interact the objects with a name.
To interact an object you have to type the proper command and the object's name.

COMMANDS:
cheatmode (you can see the object's name)
kill (kill/destroy object)
disable (disable object, disabled objects can be enabled later)
enable (enable disabled object)
activate (activate/interact object, for example: you have to activate the sword to pick it up, after you found it in a disabled bush)
restart (restart from last checkpoint)
speed (set walk speed, speed is between 0 and 1; speed 0 is stop, speed 0.5 is walk and speed 1 is run)

This game is made for Ludum Dare 42.
